hero_paragraph1: Explore Ultra-Realistic Black-and-White Portraits of Children Aged 6–7 Expressing 14 Core Emotions Across Three Cultures and Genders.
hero_paragraph2: This phase captures the innocence, spontaneity, and purity of childhood emotions – universal and deeply human.
info_paragraph: The Facial Action Coding System identifies visible muscle movements that represent emotional expressions. This collection shows how those Action Units appear across regions and genders.
